# Fabric 1.20.1 Resources - Remote Index

This is a remote index of useful resources for Fabric 1.20.1, including links to documentation, source code repositories, and more.

- [Yarn](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/yarn-1.20.1+build.10/)
- [Fabric API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-api-0.92.7+1.20.1/)
- [Fabric Wiki](https://wiki.fabricmc.net/tutorial:start)
- [Yarn Documentation](https://fabricmc.net/wiki/documentation:yarn)
- [Yarn GitHub](https://github.com/FabricMC/yarn/tree/1.20.1)
- [Fabric API GitHub](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-api/tree/1.20.1)
- [Fabric Loader GitHub](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-loader/tree/0.18.4)
- [ModMenu GitHub](https://github.com/TerraformersMC/ModMenu/tree/1.20.1)
- [Yarn GitLab Mirror](https://gitlab.com/FabricMC-Mirror/FabricMC/yarn/-/tree/1.20.1?ref_type=heads)
- [Java Tutorials](https://www.w3schools.com/java/)
